about.title: What is SorteoHub?
about.description1: SorteoHub is a professional digital platform that allows you to create, manage and sell raffles online in an automated and transparent way. Unlike traditional paper raffles, our system gives you complete control over sales, real-time ticket validation, transparent winner selection and complete management of participants and payments.
about.description2: Designed specifically for organizers looking to professionalize their non-profit raffles, SorteoHub allows you to monetize products, services or special events without the limitations of physical format, with unlimited geographic reach and advanced management tools.

seo.title: Privacy Policy - SorteoHub
seo.description: Privacy policy and data protection of SorteoHub
seo.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, privacy, SorteoHub

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.p1: At SorteoHub ("we", "our", "the Platform"), we are committed to protecting your privacy and the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our services.
introduction.p2: By using SorteoHub, you agree to the practices described in this policy. If you do not agree with this policy, please do not use our services.

provided.title: 2.1. Information You Provide to Us
provided.text: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
provided.account: Account Information: Name, email address, phone number, password (encrypted)
provided.profile: Profile Information: Profile photo, biography, preferences
provided.raffles: Raffle Information: Details of created raffles, prizes, dates, rules
provided.participation: Participation Information: Selected numbers, payment information, contact data
provided.advertisers: Advertiser Information: Business data, business information, payment methods

automatic.title: 2.2. Automatically Collected Information
automatic.text: When you use our Platform, we automatically collect:
automatic.device: Device Information: Device type, operating system, unique identifiers
automatic.navigation: Navigation Information: Pages visited, time on each page, links clicked
automatic.location: Location Information: IP address, approximate geographic location
automatic.cookies: Cookies and Similar Technologies: To improve your experience and analyze usage
automatic.logs: Logs: Access dates and times, platform activity

thirdParty.title: 2.3. Third-Party Information
thirdParty.text: We may receive information about you from third parties, such as social authentication services (Google, Facebook) if you choose to connect through these services.

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.text: We use the collected information to:
howWeUse.services: Provide Services: Create and manage your account, process raffles, facilitate participation
howWeUse.communication: Communication: Send notifications, updates, responses to inquiries
howWeUse.improvement: Service Improvement: Analyze usage, identify issues, develop new features
howWeUse.security: Security: Detect and prevent fraud, abuse, illegal activities
howWeUse.personalization: Personalization: Personalize your experience, show relevant content
howWeUse.marketing: Marketing: Send promotions, offers (with your consent)
howWeUse.legal: Legal Compliance: Comply with legal obligations, respond to government requests

sharing.title: 4. Sharing Information
sharing.text: We may share your information under the following circumstances:

public.title: 4.1. Public Information
public.text: Some information is public by default:

users.title: 4.2. With Other Users
users.text: When you participate in a raffle, the raffle creator can see your name and selected numbers. This information is necessary to manage the raffle.

providers.title: 4.3. Service Providers
providers.text: We share information with service providers who help us operate the Platform, such as:
providers.note: These providers are contractually obligated to protect your information and may only use it for specified purposes.

legal.title: 4.4. Legal Requirements
legal.text: We may disclose information if required by law, court order, or legal process, or to protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of our users.

business.title: 4.5. Business Transfers
business.text: In case of merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.text: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
cookies.note: You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect Platform functionality.

security.title: 6. Information Security
security.text: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your information:
security.note: However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. Although we strive to protect your information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.text: We retain your information for as long as necessary to:
retention.note: When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your personal information, except when retention is required by law or for legitimate business purposes.

rights.title: 8. Your Rights
rights.text: You have the following rights regarding your information:

access.title: 8.1. Access
access.text: You can access and review your personal information through your account or by requesting a copy.

correction.title: 8.2. Correction
correction.text: You can update or correct your personal information at any time through your account.

deletion.title: 8.3. Deletion
deletion.text: You can request deletion of your personal information. However, we may retain certain information as required by law.

portability.title: 8.4. Portability
portability.text: You can request a copy of your information in a structured and commonly used format.

opposition.title: 8.5. Opposition
opposition.text: You can object to the processing of your information for certain purposes, such as direct marketing.

withdrawal.title: 8.6. Withdrawal of Consent
withdrawal.text: You can withdraw your consent for information processing at any time, subject to legal limitations.

minors.title: 9. Minors' Privacy
minors.p1: Our services are directed to people over 18 years of age. We do not intentionally collect personal information from minors. If we discover that we have collected information from a minor, we will take steps to delete that information immediately.
minors.p2: If you are a parent or guardian and believe your minor child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

transfers.title: 10. International Transfers
transfers.text: Your information may be transferred and processed in countries other than yours. By using our services, you consent to the transfer of your information to these countries. We ensure that appropriate safeguards are implemented to protect your information.

thirdPartyLinks.title: 11. Links to Third-Party Sites
thirdPartyLinks.text: Our Platform may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these sites. We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of any site you visit.

changes.title: 12. Changes to This Policy
changes.p1: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
changes.p2: We recommend reviewing this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.

cookieConsent.title: 13. Cookie Consent
cookieConsent.text: By using our Platform, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy. You can withdraw your consent at any time by adjusting your browser settings.

contact.title: 14. Contact
contact.text: If you have questions, concerns, or requests related to this Privacy Policy or the handling of your personal information, you can contact us:
contact.note: We are committed to responding to your inquiries within a reasonable time.

acceptance.title: 15. Acceptance
acceptance.text: By using SorteoHub, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy and consent to the processing of your information as described herein.
